trans-unit.source: Animates from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> value of the previous key frame to its own <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.Value" /> using linear interpolation.
trans-unit.target: Anima do valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Vector" /> do quadro chave anterior para seu próprio <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.Value" /> com interpolação linear.

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Vector> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada como parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrameCollection> em conjunto com um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> para animar uma <xref:System.Windows.Vector> valor da propriedade ao longo de um conjunto de quadros-chave.

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: Um quadro-chave define um segmento do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorAnimationUsingKeyFrames> ao qual ela pertence.

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Cada quadro chave tem um destino <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.Value%2A> e um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> Especifica a hora em que o quadro chave <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.VectorKeyFrame.Value%2A> devem ser atingido.

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: Um quadro chave anima do valor de destino de quadro chave anterior a seu próprio valor de destino.

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: Ele começa quando o quadro chave anterior termina e termina quando é atingido sua própria chave de tempo.

trans-unit.source: Linear key frames like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame> create a smooth, linear interpolation between values.
trans-unit.target: Quadros-chave lineares como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame> criar uma interpolação linear suave entre valores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Valor de término (também conhecido como "valor de destino") para o quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> com valor de término especificado.

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Valor de término (também conhecido como "valor de destino") para o quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: Tempo-chave para o quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: O tempo-chave determina quando o valor de destino é atingido, que também é quando o quadro-chave termina.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> com o tempo-chave e o valor de término especificados.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.LinearVectorKeyFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser usado para animar.

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0,0 e 1,0, inclusive, que especifica o percentual de tempo decorrido para este quadro-chave.

trans-unit.source: Interpolates, in a linear fashion, between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame, using the supplied progress increment.
trans-unit.target: Realiza a interpolação linear entre o valor de quadro-chave anterior e o valor do quadro-chave atual usando o incremento de progresso fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: O valor de saída desse quadro-chave, considerando o valor base e o andamento especificados.
